content.question: Which of the following part-writing errors is found in the example?

choices.label: An unresolved chordal seventh between chords 3 and 4
An unresolved leading tone between chords 3 and 4

content.answer: An unresolved chordal seventh between chords 3 and 4

unit.text: 7: Harmony and Voice Leading IV - Secondary Function

topic.text: 7.4: Part Writing of Secondary Leading Tone Chords

skill.text: Skill 2.E: Use symbols and terms to describe and apply harmonic, melodic, and rhythmic procedures of 18th-century voice leading (up to 4 voices) in notated music.
